de.chiller.vigral.jung

Class MyGraphMousePlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.control.AbstractGraphMousePlugin
      • de.chiller.vigral.jung.MyGraphMousePlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.control.GraphMousePlugin, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MyGraphMousePlugin
extends edu.uci.ics.jung.visualization.control.AbstractGraphMousePlugin
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener
    A plugin that can create vertices, undirected edges (CTRL) and directed edges (SHIFT + CTRL). Further this Plugin can pick and move one (LEFTMOUSE) or more vertices (SHIFT + DRAG_LEFTMOUSE) by using the mouse in combination with modifier keys
